actions.name: CreateCallAnalyticsCategory
actions.description: Grants permission to create an analytics category. Amazon Transcribe applies the conditions specified by your analytics categories to your call analytics jobs

actions.name: CreateLanguageModel
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new custom language model

actions.name: CreateMedicalVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new custom vocabulary that you can use to change the way Amazon Transcribe Medical handles transcription of an audio file

actions.name: CreateVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new custom vocabulary that you can use to change the way Amazon Transcribe handles transcription of an audio file

actions.name: CreateVocabularyFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new vocabulary filter that you can use to filter out words from the transcription of an audio file generated by Amazon Transcribe

actions.name: DeleteCallAnalyticsCategory
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a call analytics category using its name from Amazon Transcribe

actions.name: DeleteCallAnalyticsJob
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a previously submitted call analytics job along with any other generated results such as the transcription, models, and so on

actions.name: DeleteLanguageModel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a previously created custom language model

actions.name: DeleteMedicalTranscriptionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a previously submitted medical transcription job

actions.name: DeleteMedicalVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a medical vocabulary from Amazon Transcribe

actions.name: DeleteTranscriptionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a previously submitted transcription job along with any other generated results such as the transcription, models, and so on

actions.name: DeleteVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a vocabulary from Amazon Transcribe

actions.name: DeleteVocabularyFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a vocabulary filter from Amazon Transcribe

actions.name: DescribeLanguageModel
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a custom language model

actions.name: GetCallAnalyticsCategory
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a call analytics category

actions.name: GetCallAnalyticsJob
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a call analytics job

actions.name: GetMedicalTranscriptionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a medical transcription job

actions.name: GetMedicalVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a medical vocabulary

actions.name: GetTranscriptionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a transcription job

actions.name: GetVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to to get information about a vocabulary

actions.name: GetVocabularyFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a vocabulary filter

actions.name: ListCallAnalyticsCategories
actions.description: Grants permission to list call analytics categories that has been created

actions.name: ListCallAnalyticsJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list call analytics jobs with the specified status

actions.name: ListLanguageModels
actions.description: Grants permission to list custom language models

actions.name: ListMedicalTranscriptionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list medical transcription jobs with the specified status

actions.name: ListMedicalVocabularies
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of medical vocabularies that match the specified criteria. If no criteria are specified, returns the entire list of vocabularies

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

actions.name: ListTranscriptionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list transcription jobs with the specified status

actions.name: ListVocabularies
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of vocabularies that match the specified criteria. If no criteria are specified, returns the entire list of vocabularies

actions.name: ListVocabularyFilters
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of vocabulary filters that match the specified criteria. If no criteria are specified, returns the at most 5 vocabulary filters

actions.name: StartCallAnalyticsJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous analytics job that not only transcribes the audio recording of a caller and agent, but also returns additional insights

actions.name: StartMedicalStreamTranscription
actions.description: Grants permission to start a protocol where audio is streamed to Transcribe Medical and the transcription results are streamed to your application

actions.name: StartMedicalStreamTranscriptionWebSocket
actions.description: Grants permission to start a WebSocket where audio is streamed to Transcribe Medical and the transcription results are streamed to your application

actions.name: StartMedicalTranscriptionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to transcribe medical speech to text

actions.name: StartStreamTranscription
actions.description: Grants permission to start a bidirectional HTTP2 stream to transcribe speech to text in real time

actions.name: StartStreamTranscriptionWebSocket
actions.description: Grants permission to start a websocket stream to transcribe speech to text in real time

actions.name: StartTranscriptionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to transcribe speech to text

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a resource with given key value pairs

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag a resource with given key

actions.name: UpdateCallAnalyticsCategory
actions.description: Grants permission to update the call analytics category with new values. The UpdateCallAnalyticsCategory operation overwrites all of the existing information with the values that you provide in the request

actions.name: UpdateMedicalVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing medical vocabulary with new values. The UpdateMedicalVocabulary operation overwrites all of the existing information with the values that you provide in the request

actions.name: UpdateVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing vocabulary with new values. The UpdateVocabulary operation overwrites all of the existing information with the values that you provide in the request

actions.name: UpdateVocabularyFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing vocabulary filter with new values. The UpdateVocabularyFilter operation overwrites all of the existing information with the values that you provide in the request
